title: Stuck at reconnect screen after champion select, wont let me join game after i click reconnect.
body: Every time i have tried to play league and go through champ select fine and then once the game starts i get sent directly to the reconnect screen instead of the loading screen and even when i click reconnect, it says game is still in progress..., then goes back to saying reconnect afterwards. I have tried a clean install, my drivers are up to date and i have tried repairing my client and running as admin nothing is working. PLEASE HELP!

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some problems reaching our game servers specifically.  Since you're transitioning to the game server, it won't matter what version of the client you're on.  Instead, run through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
